verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Shika pesa Zako ukampe Bwana Nenda ukampe Bwana sadaka yako Ukatoe sadaka kwa Bwana X2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: (Jueni Kuwa) naye atawajaza Atawajazaa Baraka, atawajaza Baraka. X 2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1.Ukimpa Mungu wako chochote Ulichonacho naye atakuongeza mara mbili.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 2.Mazao ya mashambani nenda Ukampe bwana naye atakuogeza mara mbili.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 3.Vijana pia wazee, hima tutoe sadaka, Kazi ya mikono yetu ( Tumpe) Mungu wetu.
